nosotros.descripcion: Ocular started in the year 2000 with the goal of providing the best advisory and sales service for surgical supplies in the ophthalmic market. Today, we offer technology, versatility, and services to institutions, professionals, and individuals throughout the country, with quality assurance in the different stages of our product use.
nosotros.mision: Our commitment is to achieve maximum customer satisfaction, supporting their growth and meeting their needs. In short, Ocular is a company that grows daily with solvency, efficiency, and results.
nosotros.valores: We believe in what we do, and for that reason, we commit to helping more people like you every day. To ensure the process is as transparent as possible, we offer a variety of products. Choose our team to design a truly unique solution for you.

contacto.title: Contact us here or reach out via WhatsApp (+54) 011-5237-1300
contacto.texto: At Ocular, we are dedicated to offering top-quality products for all ophthalmic surgical needs. We understand how important it is to have reliable supplies and effective advice for your eye surgery; that's why you can count on us.

footer.info: More than two decades in the market of ophthalmic surgical supplies, dedicated to professionals, patients, and institutions for eye surgery.

faqData.question: What type of intraocular lens do I need for cataract surgery?
faqData.answer: The appropriate intraocular lens depends on the patient's visual needs. We offer monofocal, multifocal, and toric lenses, each with specific features. Consult your ophthalmologist to determine which is best for you.
faqData.linkText: Learn more about our intraocular lenses

faqData.question: How do you ensure the quality of supplies for ophthalmic surgery?
faqData.answer: All our products undergo rigorous quality control and are approved by leading regulatory agencies. We work only with reliable suppliers to ensure the highest quality in every supply.
faqData.linkText: More information about our quality guarantee

faqData.question: How can I request a quote for cataract surgery supplies?
faqData.answer: To request a quote for cataract surgery supplies, send the prescription via WhatsApp, including the full name of the requester. Our team will respond with a detailed quote as soon as possible.

faqData.question: How can I request advice on supplies for my eye surgery?
faqData.answer: To request advice on specific supplies for your surgery, contact our team of experts through the form on our website, by email, or WhatsApp. Attach your prescription and provide details about the type of surgery and your requirements, and we will offer personalized recommendations.
faqData.linkText: Contact us for advice on eye surgery

producto.title: Cataract Surgery
producto.texto2: The crystalline lens is a natural lens that is part of the human optical system. Its function is to focus light rays onto the retina.
producto.texto3: Cataract is the clouding or loss of transparency of the lens, which causes a slow and progressive loss of vision.

producto.title: Cornea Surgery
producto.texto2: The cornea is the transparent and curved layer that covers the front part of the eye, playing a key role in focusing light onto the retina.
producto.texto3: It protects the eye from external factors and also contributes to most of the eye's refractive power. Damage or disease to the cornea can affect vision clarity.

productos.descripcion: PMMA Intracorneal Rings for the treatment of keratoconus and keratoglobus, German design. Various sizes available.

producto.title: Pterygium Surgery
producto.texto2: Pterygium is an abnormal growth of tissue on the conjunctiva that can extend onto the cornea.
producto.texto3: Often related to sun exposure and environmental irritants, it can cause irritation, redness, and in advanced cases, affect vision if it invades the visual axis. Treatment may require surgery if it affects vision.

producto.title: Retina Surgery
producto.texto2: The retina is a thin layer of tissue that lines the inside of the eye. It consists of light-sensitive cells that capture images and send them to the brain through the optic nerve.
producto.texto3: Damage to the retina can significantly affect vision, causing problems like detachments or macular degeneration.

producto.title: Glaucoma Surgery
producto.texto2: Glaucoma is an eye disease that causes progressive damage to the optic nerve, usually due to increased intraocular pressure.
producto.texto3: This condition can lead to gradual vision loss and, without treatment, irreversible visual impairment. Early diagnosis is key to preventing severe damage.
